name: foam-central
description: Central Foam notes + per-project journals and VCS log.

commands.title: Foam Central: Create Workspace for Current Folder
Foam Central: Initialize Notes Git Repo

foamCentral.notesFolder.description: Absolute path to your central Foam notes folder (the Foam workspace root).

foamCentral.projectNotesFolder.description: Relative folder inside the notes workspace where project folders are stored.

foamCentral.notesGit.autoSyncEnabled.description: Enable automatic Git commit and push for the notes folder if it is a Git repository.

foamCentral.notesGit.saveCountThreshold.description: Number of note saves after which Foam Central will automatically sync notes Git (if there are changes).

foamCentral.notesGit.minutesThreshold.description: Minimum number of minutes between auto-syncs when there are uncommitted changes in the notes repo.

foamCentral.notesGit.commitMessage.description: Commit message template for automatic notes commits. `{reason}` will be replaced with save-threshold, timer or manual.
